Okay,

     Thanks for your post Airly. :-) I think I am going to attempt to attempt to end the battle in one single massive post. I think with two of us running so many characters we could miss details and it would frustrate me to no end to correct everything. 

My wife's car is down so I'm having to drive her around, so it may take me a day or so to craft the post.

See you really soon

Preston

supercyclonus wrote: 
>             Thanks, I appreciated that - good post. I will post the sweep's responses as soon as airly posts. I believe she said she had Jhiaxus, Kup and Grimlock, and Kup is inside that area of darkness near the Ark 
> Preston 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com , "jdmyemail" <jdmyemail@. ..> wrote: 
>> 
>> And posted again finally!  Again, sorry for the wait.  I work ALL day 
>> on Friday and Saturdays.  
>> 
>> Shard will continue firing on the ship unless someone attacks him, in 
>> which case, he'll turn his rockets on them. 
>> 
>> I'm really itching for this battle to be over and for us to be able to 
>> get some character interaction in, so feel free to just have Shard do 
>> as I mentioned and wrap things up. 
>> 
>> As for what my characters know, I'm thinking that them not knowing 
>> anything or anyone might be easiest, but I'll see how it goes.  What 
>> I've indicated that they know has to do with their recent history 
>> before they ended up in stasis ect. 
>> 
>
